name: Aim Trainer (With Cats)
description:
Aim Trainer (With Cats) is a good way to practice your aim in FPS games. The game itself is simple, allowing you to improve your aim in short bursts.

  • Target Spawn Settings
  • Various Target Colors
  • Various Crosshair Colors
  • Simple Visuals (high Fps)
  • Current and High Score Tracking
  • Any and All Future Updates Are Free
